# CameraMode enumeration

The camera mode for the player camera

```csharp
public enum CameraMode
```

## Values

| name | value | description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| FPS | `0` | FPS Mode |
| TPS | `1` | TPS Mode |
| Follow | `2` | Follow player mode |
| Dungeon | `3` | Dungeon camera mode |
